The court seeks to balance interests while the law is reviewed.

Select models will support Apple Intelligence features.

description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio affirmed support for Qatar's Gaza mediation after Israeli strikes, despite prior criticism from Rubio and President Trump. Netanyahu defended the strikes targeting Hamas, comparing them to post-9/11 US actions against terrorists. He asserted that harboring terrorists negates sovereignty.

While the Pope earns a substantial salary, the Vatican faces financial challenges, including a reported deficit that led to salary cuts for cardinals. Read below!

description: R Vaishali defended her FIDE Women’s Grand Swiss title in 2025, securing a spot in the 2026 Candidates Tournament. She finished with 8 points after drawing against Tan Zhongyi. Vaishali joins Koneru Humpy and Divya Deshmukh as the third Indian woman to qualify for the Candidates, marking a significant achievement for Indian women's chess.

These developments occurred amidst ongoing trade negotiations, with both countries seeking to resolve economic and trade disputes, including the TikTok issue.

description: A cloudburst in Jammu and Kashmir's Reasi district caused flash floods, creating panic among residents, though no casualties were reported. Heavy rains continue to plague North India, leading to floods, transportation disruptions, and school closures. Recent cloudbursts, landslides, and flash floods have resulted in numerous fatalities and injuries across the region, prompting authorities to issue warnings and suspend pilgrimages.

description: The Royal Oman Police now legally recognize certified electronic versions of national ID cards and driver’s licenses across Oman. Accessible via the official website, these digital documents hold the same legal status as physical copies. This change, alongside new flexible expat residence cards and extended validity for Omani IDs, reflects Oman’s ongoing commitment to digital transformation and streamlined public services.

Why Musk cannot pull a 'Trump' in the UK; even with Mr Robinson
description: ​This is the backdrop Elon Musk has parachuted into, with the grace of a meme lord and the menace of a billionaire arsonist. He has found Britain’s sorest nerve—immigration—and jabbed it with the same glee he once reserved for short-sellers. Grooming gangs, free speech, Tommy Robinson: Musk has taken Britain’s ugliest domestic quarrels and broadcast them to the world, not because he loves Britain, but because chaos is his native language.

Savannah James: 'I never fully adjusted to the spotlight'
description: Savannah James, wife of LeBron James, maintains a low public profile despite her husband's fame, expressing discomfort with red carpets and TV appearances. She prioritizes family privacy while supporting LeBron's philanthropic work and athletic dedication. Together since 2004, they navigate life in Los Angeles, actively supporting their son Bronny's basketball career.

title: Kelce vs Reynolds: Swift's team denies link — Blake Lively lawsuit twist
description: Taylor Swift's legal team asserted she has no involvement in the lawsuit between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni concerning his film, *It Ends With Us*. A judge denied Baldoni's request to question Swift, reinforcing her lack of connection to the case. Amidst the legal turmoil, Travis Kelce has reportedly supported Swift, even unfollowing Ryan Reynolds on social media.

title: Emmanuel Acho backlash: Charlie Kirk remarks spark row — Joe Burrow acts
description: Emmanuel Acho is under fire for spreading inaccurate claims about Charlie Kirk in viral TikTok and YouTube videos, refusing to correct them even after backlash. At the same time, the Joe Burrow Foundation cut ties with Hamilton County Judge Ted Berry, removing him from its board over remarks following Kirk’s assassination at Utah Valley University.

title: Gemini Nano Banana AI Saree: What it this new trend; how you can create photos
description: Following the Nano Banana AI 3D figurine craze, the 'Banana AI Saree' trend has emerged on Instagram. Users are transforming selfies into 90s Bollywood-style portraits using Google’s Gemini Nano Banana image editing tool. The AI crafts images with chiffon sarees, grainy textures, and golden-hour lighting, mimicking classic Bollywood aesthetics with popular styles like polka-dot and floral sarees.

title: Mahomes won’t play vs Eagles, Andy Reid confirms amid injury
description: The Kansas City Chiefs will face the Philadelphia Eagles in Week 2 without rookie wide receiver Xavier Worthy due to a knee injury. Coach Andy Reid confirmed Worthy's absence, impacting the Chiefs' offensive strategy. Worthy's speed and deep-threat ability will be missed, placing more pressure on Travis Kelce and other receivers to perform against the Eagles' strong defense.

title: ‘We will do better’: Microsoft CEO acknowledges ‘lack of empathy’; meets with staff
description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella acknowledged the need to rebuild trust with employees following layoffs and a return-to-office mandate. He addressed concerns about a perceived lack of empathy and the challenges of remote work, particularly for new hires. Nadella also cautioned staff about future business challenges and the need for renewal.

title: Fans slam NFL’s Charlie Kirk tribute at Lambeau Field
description: The NFL and Green Bay Packers honored Charlie Kirk with a moment of silence before facing the Washington Commanders. Fans called it rushed and poorly executed, slamming the league for inconsistency compared to past public statements. Kirk, 31, was killed Wednesday in Utah. The tribute came as Trump vowed to award him the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
